title: Fall is Time to move! Lagre 2-bed Apt Coming 9/9. Apply today!
map_address: 10785 E Exposition Ave near S Havana St
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome to Park Place at Expo Apartments', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 127', 'OR Text', '127', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Throughout our community of Aurora, CO apartments, you will find resident amenities designed to complement your lifestyle.', 'Our streamlined fitness center allows you to get your workout in without having to leave the community or pay for a pricy gym membership.', 'Also, our swimming pool is ready and waiting for you in the summer months to dive in, cool off, and catch some rays.', 'Take advantage of our picnic stations complete with outdoor grills or take your pup for a stroll around our courtyard.', 'We also offer a community playground!', 'Five on-site laundry rooms as well as a package retrieval station make your chores just a little simpler, plus, you can take advantage of our resident business center with printing services as a quiet place to get some work done.', 'Schedule your tour today and check out our resident amenities here at Park Place at Expo.', 'Features:', 'Plank-Wood Flooring*, Spacious Walk-In Closets*, Modern Kitchen Appliance Package including Disposal, Newly Renovated Studio, 1-, and 2-Bedroom Homes', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Community Playground, Pet-Friendly Community, 24-Hour On-Site Laundry Facilities, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Sparkling, Heated Swimming Pool and Sun Deck, Multiple Community Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Fitness Center, Business Center', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400 Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'HFtKu8u0QY']
